name: Martenitsa
description:
Martenitsa is a pixel art snake game where you need to get long enough to complete the puzzles. The theme of the game is a Bulgarian tradition that occurs on March 1st. Every year on that day people give to their friends and family red and white bracelets called martenitsa, a symbol of health and longevity.

In the game you play as a martenitsa.

Collect hidden knots around the map to get longer.

Wrap yourself around checkpoints to finish each level.

Enjoy some good old press-buttons-to-open-doors puzzle solving.

Make sure you don't get cut by the scissors!

And avoid getting wet.

Follow me on Twitter, I like company! I started tweeting about the journey of making this game some time ago and I will continue talking about it.

The music in the game is performed by Ravnec Folklore Band.
